channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: ‘Georgie & Mandy’s First Marriage’ expands the ‘Big Bang Theory’ universe
item.description: Fans of “Young Sheldon,” the popular prequel of “The Big Bang Theory,” now have a new show to enjoy featuring the Cooper family.

item.title: US home sales slowed again in September, falling to weakest annual pace in nearly 14 years
item.description: Sales of previously occupied U.S. homes slowed in September to the weakest annual pace in nearly 14 years even as mortgage rates eased and the supply of properties on the market continued to climb.

item.title: Indiana man gets life in prison for 1975 drowning of Indiana teenager
item.description: An Indiana man has been sentenced to life in prison for the 1975 killing of a 17-year-old girl. A judge sentenced 69-year-old Fred Bandy Jr. on Tuesday to a life term with the possibility of parole in Laurel Jean Mitchell’s death.
